mapper.select: SELECT GAME_ID , PLATFORM_ID , GAME_CREATION , GAME_DURATION , MAP_ID , SEASON_ID , GAME_VERSION , GAME_MODE , GAME_TYPE FROM MATCH_BASIC WHERE GAME_ID = #{gameId}

SELECT , GAME_ID , TEAM_ID , WIN , FIRST_BLOOD , FIRST_TOWER , FIRST_INHIBITOR , FIRST_BARON , FIRST_DRAGON , FIRST_RIFT_HERALD , TOWER_KILLS , INHIBITOR_KILLS , BARON_KILLS , VILEMAW_KILLS , RIFT_HERALD_KILLS , DOMINION_VICTORY_SCORE FROM MATCH_TEAM WHERE GAME_ID = #{gameId} ORDER BY TEAM_ID
SELECT GAME_ID , TEAM_ID , CHAMPION_ID , PICK_TURN FROM MATCH_TEAM_BAN WHERE GAME_ID = #{gameId} ORDER BY PICK_TURN

MP_T.LANE , MP_T.LANE_SEQ FROM MATCH_PARTICIPANT_BASIC MP_B JOIN MATCH_PARTICIPANT_INFO MP_I ON MP_B.GAME_ID = MP_I.GAME_ID AND MP_B.PARTICIPANT_ID = MP_I.PARTICIPANT_ID JOIN MATCH_PARTICIPANT_STATS MP_S ON MP_B.GAME_ID = MP_S.GAME_ID AND MP_B.PARTICIPANT_ID = MP_S.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN MATCH_PARTICIPANT_TIMELINE MP_T ON MP_B.GAME_ID = MP_T.GAME_ID AND MP_B.PARTICIPANT_ID = MP_T.PARTICIPANT_ID WHERE MP_B.GAME_ID = #{gameId} ORDER BY MP_I.PARTICIPANT_ID
